csslist.name: gridtable
csslist.cssscript:
<!-- CSS goes in the document HEAD or added to your external stylesheet -->
table.gridtable {
	font-family: verdana,arial,sans-serif;
	font-size:11px;
	color:#333333;
	border-width: 1px;
	border-color: #666666;
	border-collapse: collapse;
}
table.gridtable th {
	border-width: 1px;
	padding: 8px;
	border-style: solid;
	border-color: #666666;
	background-color: #dedede;
}
table.gridtable td {
	border-width: 1px;
	padding: 8px;
	border-style: solid;
	border-color: #666666;
	background-color: #ffffff;
}

stylelist.sname:
<!-- CSS goes in the document HEAD or added to your external stylesheet -->
table.gridtable

csslist.name: imagetable
csslist.cssscript:
<!-- CSS goes in the document HEAD or added to your external stylesheet -->
table.imagetable {
	font-family: verdana,arial,sans-serif;
	font-size:11px;
	color:#333333;
	border-width: 1px;
	border-color: #999999;
	border-collapse: collapse;
}
table.imagetable th {
	background:#b5cfd2 url('/images/cell-blue.jpg');
	border-width: 1px;
	padding: 8px;
	border-style: solid;
	border-color: #999999;
}
table.imagetable td {
	background:#dcddc0 url('/images/cell-grey.jpg');
	border-width: 1px;
	padding: 8px;
	border-style: solid;
	border-color: #999999;
}

stylelist.sname:
<!-- CSS goes in the document HEAD or added to your external stylesheet -->
table.imagetable
